p: CVD may become more severe in the presence of viral infection because of the imbalance between the increased metabolic demand and reduced cardiac reserve. Therefore, patients with coronary artery disease and heart failure have a high mortality rate [ 42]. ACE-2 was identified as a crucial factor mediating SARS-CoV spike (S) protein's interaction with susceptible host cells. In physiological conditions, angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) is a master regulator of the renin-angiotensin system and one of best in target enzymes for the treatment of hypertension. The protease renin converts angiotensinogen to angiotensin I (ANG I), which is consequently transformed to ANG II by ACE. ANG II then unites to the ANG II type 1 receptor (AT1R) to promote inflammation, oxidative stress, and increase in blood pressure.
